mapper.sql: A.UID AS UID,A.UCNS_SEQNO AS UCNSSEQNO,A.EMS_NO AS EMSNO,A.CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT,A.ENDPRD_SEQNO AS ENDPRDSEQNO,A.MTPCK_SEQNO AS MTPCKSEQNO ,A.UCNS_VERNO AS UCNSVERNO,A.UCNS_QTY AS UCNSQTY,A.NET_USEUP_QTY AS NETUSEUPQTY,A.TGBL_LOSS_RATE AS TGBLLOSSRATE,A.INTGB_LOSS_RATE AS INTGBLOSSRATE ,A.UCNS_DCL_STUCD AS UCNSDCLSTUCD,A.MODF_MARKCD AS MODFMARKCD,A.BOND_MTPCK_PRPR AS BONDMTPCKPRPR,A.ETPS_EXE_MARKCD AS ETPSEXEMARKCD ,A.ETPS_PREENT_NO AS ETPSPREENTNO,A.DCL_TIME AS DCLTIME,A.UCNS_VALID_DATE AS UCNSVALIDDATE,A.RMK AS RMK,A.CREATE_BY AS CREATEBY ,A.CREATE_NAME AS CREATENAME,A.CREATE_TIME AS CREATETIME,A.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATEBY,A.UPDATE_NAME AS UPDATENAME,A.UPDATE_TIME AS UPDATETIME ,A.SEQ_NO AS SEQNO,B.ATTR_NAME AS UCNSDCLSTUNM,C.ATTR_NAME AS MODFMARKNM,D.ATTR_NAME AS ETPSEXEMARKNM ,E.GDS_MTNO AS MTPCKGDSMTNO,E.GDECD AS MTPCKGDECD,E.GDS_NM AS MTPCKGDSNM,F.GDS_MTNO AS ENDPRDGDSMTNO,F.GDECD AS ENDPRDGDECD,F.GDS_NM AS ENDPRDGDSNM
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(UCNS_SEQNO),0) AS UCNSSEQNO FROM BSSP_EMS.EMS_PUTREC_UCNS_DT WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM EMS_PUTREC_UCNS_DT A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES B ON B.ATTR_VALUE = A.UCNS_DCL_STUCD AND B.DICTIONARY_VALUE='UCNS_DCL_STUCD' LEFT JOIN bssp_cod.COD_STD_CODES C ON C.ATTR_VALUE=A.MODF_MARKCD AND C.DICTIONARY_VALUE='MODF_MARK' LEFT JOIN bssp_cod.COD_STD_CODES D ON D.ATTR_VALUE=A.ETPS_EXE_MARKCD AND D.DICTIONARY_VALUE='ETPS_EXE_MARK' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT GDS_SEQNO,GDECD,GDS_NM,GDS_MTNO,SEQ_NO from EMS_PUTREC_IMG his WHERE MODF_MARKCD='3' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM EMS_PUTREC_UCNS_DT WHERE his.SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO AND his.CHG_TMS_CNT=CHG_TMS_CNT AND UID = #{uid}) UNION SELECT DISTINCT GDS_SEQNO,GDECD,GDS_NM,GDS_MTNO,SEQ_NO from EMS_CUS_IMG cus WHERE cus.SEQ_NO=(SELECT SEQ_NO FROM EMS_PUTREC_UCNS_DT WHERE UID = #{uid}) ) E ON A.MTPCK_SEQNO = E.GDS_SEQNO AND A.SEQ_NO = E.SEQ_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT GDS_SEQNO,GDECD,GDS_NM,GDS_MTNO,SEQ_NO from EMS_PUTREC_EXG his WHERE MODF_MARKCD='3' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM EMS_PUTREC_UCNS_DT WHERE his.SEQ_NO=SEQ_NO AND his.CHG_TMS_CNT = CHG_TMS_CNT AND UID = #{uid}) UNION SELECT DISTINCT GDS_SEQNO,GDECD,GDS_NM,GDS_MTNO,SEQ_NO from EMS_CUS_EXG cus WHERE cus.SEQ_NO=(SELECT SEQ_NO FROM EMS_PUTREC_UCNS_DT WHERE UID = #{uid}) ) F ON A.ENDPRD_SEQNO = F.GDS_SEQNO AND A.SEQ_NO = F.SEQ_NO WHERE A.UID = #{uid}
